definition: Aquarius (constellation and sign of the zodiac)/also called 水瓶座

sentences.english: Aquarius People are likely to socialise with family friends and relatives.
sentences.chinese: 寶瓶座傾向於跟家友和親戚交往。

sentences.english: Pisces lies between Aries and Aquarius in the northern skies.
sentences.chinese: 雙魚位於北方天空中白羊座和寶瓶座之間。

sentences.english: Aquarians are very friendly people, great conversationalists and thinkers.
sentences.chinese: 寶瓶座的人非常友好，是個口才絕佳的思想家。

sentences.english: According to Tibetan Buddhism, treasure bottle could keep down demons, protect from disasters and bring the safety.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教認爲寶瓶可以鎮邪消災保一方平安。

sentences.english: A constellation in the equatorial region of the Southern Hemisphere near Aquarius and Eridanus.
sentences.chinese: 鯨魚座南半球赤道地區靠近寶瓶座與波江座的星座。

sentences.english: Compared with famous has the aquarius ear annular nebula and the lyra ring nebula.
sentences.chinese: 比較著名的有寶瓶座耳輪狀星雲和天琴座環狀星雲。

sentences.english: They covered up the treasure bottle of Gongjue living Buddha.
sentences.chinese: 把貢覺活佛給他們的寶瓶埋在裏面。

sentences.english: In the Age of Aquarius all information is within our reach.
sentences.chinese: 寶瓶時代所有的信息我們都可以得到。

sentences.english: Open treasure bottles to see crystal bright.
Coming, or the birth of the Aquarian Age.
sentences.chinese: 你能到精神上的知覺，寶瓶座的時代來臨。

definition: the Eternal Wheel of life in Buddhism
ushering in wealth and prosperity (idiom and traditional greeting, esp. at New Year); We wish you wealth and success!
Mt Meru or Sumeru, sacred mountain in Buddhist and Jain tradition/Mt Xumi in Guyuan 固原[Gu4 yuan2], Ningxia, with many Buddhist cave statues
ribbon (as a decoration)/cordon (diagonal belt worn as a sign of office or honor)
Maitreya/the Bodhisattva that will be the next to come after Shakyamuni Buddha
Manjushri, the Bodhisattva of keen awareness
Guanyin, the Bodhisattva of Compassion or Goddess of Mercy (Sanskrit Avalokiteśvara)
